ing: 2 (28 ounce) cans baked beans (such as Bush's OriginalÂ®)
des: "Delicious baked beans with the surprising secret ingredient. I take these to potluck events all the time and they are always a hit! I prefer Bush's OriginalÂ® baked beans."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Drain pineapple reserving 1/3 cup juice.
Combine ketchup, reserved pineapple juice, brown sugar, and ground mustard in a large casserole dish. Stir baked beans, sausage, and crushed pineapple into the ketchup mixture.
Bake in preheated oven until heated through, 30 to 35 minutes.
